sunday_gathering.heading: Sunday Gathering
sunday_gathering.description: Our Sunday gathering happens every Sunday at 10:45am and is for all ages. We gather to worship Jesus, hear from God's Word, and pray together.

image.alt: Worship team leading sung praise during Sunday gathering

midweek_online_prayers.heading: Midweek Online Prayers
midweek_online_prayers.description: Monday to Friday at 8:00am for 30 minutes on Zoom.
midweek_online_prayers.extra: We also meet in church on the first Sunday of each month from 10:00-10:30am before the service.

foodbank.heading: Food Bank
foodbank.where: St John's Park, Bernard Street, S2 5PU
foodbank.who: Anyone with a referral from a support worker or agency
foodbank.description: The St John's Park food bank is provided in collaboration with Sheffield Food and Community Trust and Trussell.
foodbank.referral_policy: The food bank is accessible by referral only, and provides an emergency parcel for those in food crisis.
foodbank.support_description: At the food bank, we offer support with more than just food; Citizens Advice and Debt Support workers are available during the food bank session for those with referrals.
foodbank.referrals_heading: To request a referral for a food parcel call either:
referrals: Help Through Hardship: 08082082138 Monday to Friday 9am - 5pm. Translators available.
Citizens Advice Sheffield: 08082787820 Monday to Friday 10am - 4pm. Select option 4 for Advice Line.
Sheffield S6 helpline: 0114 321 0733 Monday to Friday 10am-1pm.
foodbank.volunteer_html: If you are interested in volunteering at our food bank, please contact Hannah Graham for more information: hannah@saintjohnspark.org.

image.alt: Food bank volunteers welcoming people in the church hall

lunch_club.heading: Lunch Club
lunch_club.description: Join us every Monday for soup, bread, a hot drink, and a chat. All are welcome, and it is free.

image.alt: Lunch Club guests and volunteers sharing a meal together

seasonal_events.heading: Seasonal Events
seasonal_events.description: Throughout the year we host seasonal gatherings for all ages, including Christmas events and community celebrations.
